net.shadowfacts.mirror.scanner

Interface Scanner<T,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of thing to scan for
    I - The input options that determine the scan parameters
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassScanner<I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JarScanner, PackageScanner

    public interface Scanner<T,I>
    A scanner that returns a Set of all Ts available based on the given input. Right now only class scanners are implemented.
    See Also:
    ClassScanner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<T> scan(I input)
      Scans for all applicable Ts based on the given input I

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        java.util.Set<T> scan(I input)
        Scans for all applicable Ts based on the given input I
        Parameters:
        input - The input
        Returns:
        All applicable Ts
